新手推荐去玩人类，最好组个车队，有语音玩起来很舒服，尽量别玩屠夫容易血压高，特别是最好别在晚上玩。匹配机制不行，屠夫经常低段位匹配到高段位人类车队，机子开的很快，容易四跑然后血压升高。

Dead by Daylight 係一款 1對4 嘅非對稱競技遊戲。每場遊戲都會由一名玩家扮演殺手，四名玩家扮演倖存者，地圖上會總共出現7部發電機，而倖存者需要修復好其中嘅五部，同埋打開門大門逃離地圖。而殺手就需要喺呢段期間追獵倖存者，以防止倖存者逃離地圖。

Download this game and let's play together~haha>"<

Гавно игра

A really really bad console port. Vsync is always on. Game is also capped at 60fps. Doesnt support ultrawide monitors. You cant adjust your resolution. The graphics settings are barely existent. You cant even change your mouse sensitivity...what kind of janky ass PC game doesnt allow you to change your sensitivity. The game just screams "Buy our microtransactions" .

Not worth your time even for $10 on sale like i got it. refund time.
good

One of the best horror games to buy! 
Dead by Daylight is an awesome horror survival game. There are two sides to this multiplayer game, killer ( First person ) and survivor (Third person). Both are fun roles but I prefer the survivor. As you run around trying to survive and trying your best to fix generators and sneaking past the killer your adrenaline is pumping! When you’re the killer you are in this great first person experience where you try your best to trick out your opponent and get them all before they escape your wrath. Being in third person and having four people on your team and only one killer the survivors have a big advantage but it is still extremely hard to win. Have fun with this game! It's worth the money. The community can be toxic but every multiplayer game has their fair share of that.  

10/10 would recommend it to everyone.

Vous n'allez pas regrettez d'avoir acheté ce jeu surtout à 10 euros en offre, rapport qualité prix irréprochable (assez rare d'ailleurs).

Hello! I just got this game, I love it.  You can play with friends and talk to others.  It can scare people that are scared easily.   It maybe will be frustrating but you will get a good match time to time.   There's lots of chapters to get and skins, also there are items you can buy and skills.  I would say that you should get it soon and start out with the normal game.  Also there's a glitch where if you can't get a match in a party and to fix this just go leave the group or go to menus.  When you are in a match you can't chat to others in the typing chat you see when waiting, but you can chat in discord and other apps for talking.

Save your money, even if its free its not worth the unbalanced sides. Killers are OVER POWERED ever since I owned the game. Takes forever to find a game. The killers can just camp you if they want when your caught on a hook, they should make it so that is not possible. Every time I come back to try the game to see if they made it more balanced they just make it worse off for the survivors. Cant even win/escape 1 game out of  20. I been playing this game and leveled up many characters to lvl 50 more then once also. If you play by yourself as the killer then it might be fun for a few games just winning over and over but then get old. If you play with friends get ready to throw your computer out the window.

Good meme

Dead by Daylight so far in 2019-2022 has been my favorite pass time, and game to play. I love the idea of 4 players working together to fix 5 generators on a randomized map while having to avoid a 5th person, who plays the role as a killer. Its an asymmetrical 4 VS 1 game. This game is not what you would say, scary, but has a dread of fear that lingers over me every time I play it. Through all my matches and hours playing this game, I can safely say that this is my number one. I just love it. Truly a one of a kind game. 10/10.

It good game I like

I would highly recommend this game to others, this game is very fun, if you play with your friends it makes it all the more worth while, it's nice to get to talk to your friends and help them out if they're fairly new to the game, it's even more fun playing the custom matches where everyone gets to try out being the killer with unlockable perks and such, the game does have some bugs, but it's still very fun and I scream a lot, it is intense and it gets your adrenaline up. 100% would buy again!
Would 100% recommend for people who play with their friends in a full group. quick games, different scenarios, and a whole lot of ear rape screaming! :D have fun. see you on the rift.
作为一名玩了1100小时的普通玩家，最近的许多bug改动，以及机制问题平衡性真的影响非常大，1.钥匙的问题一直没有解决2.延迟机制还是很差，隔板刀bug修复，对于人玩家特别友好，但是在玩屠夫时，出现的情况是判断机制不管是刀砍了，声音出来了，还是判断无伤害。然后便是人物模型问题，最近的人物模型普遍改小，导致不管是玩人还是玩屠夫时体验都非常的差。目前是不推荐这游戏。
